instructions:
Character Sheet designed to play Warhammer 40k Rogue Trader pen & paper RPG by Fantasy Flight Games. This Sheet does Not require API scripts.

Check out this sheet Wiki page for more information about all of its features at [Rogue Trader Improved Wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/Rogue_trader_improved)

**IMPORTANT TIP** The roll template is best displayed in chat when **turning off the ENABLE CHAT AVATARS** option in the My Settings tab.

If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback, send a private message to [Mago](https://app.roll20.net/users/986445/mago)

**Revision 4 June 2024**
